title.narrative: 03-04 Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) PROGRAM SUPPORT

description.narrative: 3.4. Salaries & personnel costs, travel costs, internal workshops, consultants to support staff capacities (not directly linked to other outputs) in Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) Section, which contributes to Sanitation, Wash â€“ General, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 3. By 2021, children (including adolescents), and pregnant women, especially those from rural and peri-urban areas, benefit from improved and equitable access to and use of systems that deliver safe drinking water, improved sanitation and improved hygiene practices.
Water supply and Sanitation policy, planning and administration
